mapper.select: SELECT u.pwd , u.name, r.role_name FROM user AS u INNER JOIN user_role AS ur ON u.u_id = ur.user_id INNER JOIN role AS r ON r.r_id = ur.role_id WHERE u.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user(id, pwd, name, birth_date, gender, tel, email, reg_date) VALUES(#{id}, #{pwd}, #{name}, #{birthDate}, #{gender}, #{tel}, #{email}, utc_timestamp )
INSERT INTO user_role(user_id, role_id, reg_date) VALUES(#{uid}, #{rid}, utc_timestamp )
